name: The Upgrade
description:
Made with Bitsy. Use arrow keys to play.

Tools and resources used:

  • ruin's Pixsy tool
  • ayolland's Borksy tool
  • Sean S. LeBlanc's Bitsymuse hack
  • Mario Paint background music (converted to MIDI by Jeff Benson)
  • skrudriver.wav by freesound user granconill (public domain)
  • FX_Sproing_1.wav by freesound user Pete Barry (modified) (licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license)
